content.raw: mm I've started experiencing problems exiting gazebo (Ctrl+Q) after creating a joint in the model editor, seems to be stuck on JointMaker destructor. `ModelTreeWidget_TEST` also won't finish running.  Maybe not due to this pull request but just wonder if you've run into this while making the joint creation tool?
content.html: mm I've started experiencing problems exiting gazebo (Ctrl+Q) after creating a joint in the model editor, seems to be stuck on JointMaker destructor. ModelTreeWidget_TEST also won't finish running. Maybe not due to this pull request but just wonder if you've run into this while making the joint creation tool?
